title: Shawl, 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: pineapple fiber (piña), cotton
Technique: satin and buttonhole stitches on plain weave; withdrawn element work
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Norris W. Harkness
description: Long narrow sheer rectangular shawl with white-on-white embroidery. Floral vine border is continuous on all sides. At both ends, a large bunch of flowers tied together loosely with a ribbon fills the full width.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, 19th–early 20th century.
19th–early 20th century. Medium: pineapple fiber (piña), cotton
Technique: satin and buttonhole stitches on plain weave; withdrawn element work. Gift of Mrs. Norris W. Harkness. 1974-14-1.
